content: complimentary pattern fall leaves design by bobbi intveld no 1326 no 1309 no 1302 mossy green a earth ivy b gravel road c mini hank mini hank mini hank no 1312 no 1303 no 1323 drift wood d highland fleece e ember glow f mini hank mini hank mini hank no 1311 rusted roof g mini hank experience level - intermediate materials - woolstok worsted bundle 100% fine highland wool 21 mini hanks 5g/12yds each 1 bundle fall festival - size 6 4mm needles or size needed to obtain gauge - size 6 4mm double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge - tapestry needle size - one finished measurements fall leaves no 202224 - birch 4¼ height by 3 width - maple 3½ height by 4½ width design by bobbi intveld pattern - oak 4¾ height by 3½ width a colorful mix of oak birch and maple leaves for your fall or height does not include stem holiday décor use as garland coasters or just sprinkle around gauge the room for that fall pop of color in garter stitch 20 sts and 18 row = 4 abbreviations bobble bind off co cast on fo fasten_off k knit k2tog knit 2 stitches together complimentary pattern blue sky fibers lli left lifted increase insert left needle into top of stitch one row below first stitch on right needle knit this loop m1l make one left insert left needle from front to back under strand between last stitch worked and next stitch on left needle knit this loop through the back m1r make one right insert left needle from back to front under strand between last stitch worked and next stitch on left needle knit this loop through the front p purl pso pass stitch over rli right lifted increase insert right needle into top of stitch one row below next stitch on left needle knit this loop rs right side s2kp2 slip 2 stitches knitwise as if to knit 2 together k1 pass 2 slipped stitches over the knit stitch sk2p slip 1 stitch knitwise knit 2 stitches row 10 k1 lli k to last st rli k1 19 sts together pass the slipped stitch over the 2 row 11 k9 p1 k9 stitches knit together row 12 k1 ssk k to the last 3 sts k2tog k1 17 sts ssk slip slip knit slip 2 stitches separately row 13 k8 p1 k8 knitwise insert left needle in front of 2 slipped stitches knit 2 slipped stitches row 14 k to end together row 15 k8 p1 k8 st s stitch es row 16 k1 ssk k to the last 3 sts k2tog k1 15 sts ws wrong side row 17 k7 p1 k7 row 18 k to end notes leave short 3 tail when casting on when binding row 19 k7 p1 k7 off slip the first stitch without working it one leaf can be completed using 1 mini if you run short due to row 20 k1 ssk
